description:
Peter’s in quite the pickle this time. On one hand, he knows exactly what the guildmaster is trying to do. But on the other, Piglette really wants Peter to pick her pepper.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Peter Grill and the Orc`s True Character
Peter Grill et l`éveil de l`orque
Peter Grill to Orc no Kakusei
Peter Grill und die wahre Natur des Orks
ピーター・グリルとオークの覚醒
